Beth Koigi bụ onye ọchụnta ego Kenya na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite ịnweta mmiri maka obodo ndị na-adịghị grid
Koigi bụ onye guzobere Majik Water,   ụlọ ọrụ nke na-achọ iweta mmiri ọñụñụ site na ikuku iji jeere obodo dị iche iche ozi n'ụwa niile na-enweghị ike ịnweta mmiri ọñụñụ dị ọcha.
A mụrụ Koigi na Kimende na mpaghara Kiambu

Koigi nwetara nzere bachelọ sayensị na mmepe obodo, atụmatụ na njikwa sitere na Mahadum Chuka, Kenya (Klas nke 2013), yana Nzere nke Maastas atụmatụ na njikwa sitere na Mahadum Nairobi (Klas nke 2017)

N'ịgbaso nzere bachelọ ya, ọ bụ onye guzobere Aqua Clean Initiative, hiwere na 2013. Enyere Koigi onyinye mmekọ mmiri na-eto eto na Septemba, 2018,   ma bụrụkwa onye otu ugbu a na Royal Commonwealth Society, Nordic Baltic Hub kemgbe Eprel 2015. Na mgbakwunye, Koigi bụ onye na-enye ndụmọdụ maka Pollination Project kemgbe Disemba 2015

Koigi bụ onye guzobere Majik Water ugbu a, nke hiwere na Julaị 2017. Majik Water meriri EDF Pulse Award Africa na 2017,  na Koigi bụ onye ahọpụtara ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Royal Academy of Engineering Africa 2019
